column2:
"Your opponent is large, but if you don't
make any mistakes, you can kill it.
Don't startle at its size."

"It's entire body is like a rock, but since
it's alive, there must be a soft critical
point somewhere."

"Well, not like I have to explain that
to you at this point. Hurry up and get
killing."

"相手はデカいが、やり方さえ
間違わなければ殺せる。
大きさにビビるんじゃないよ。"

"全身が岩みたいだからって
生き物だから柔らかい急所が必ずある。"

"ま、今さらあんたに解説するような
話じゃないね。早く殺しに向かって。"
